Dashboards Power BI Migration Description Zurich Senior Management came up with an approach to migrate all the Dashboards from Business Objects to Power BI and the backend to be moved from a regular Relational Database to Microsoft Azure Cloud Environment This decision is taken to enhance the existing functionality and provide rich look for Users without compromising on the performance Duration
